notes: Peerbit is used as a real-world TS monorepo for TS-resolved callgraph quality, daemon warm latency, and incremental patch benchmarks.
Curated edges currently live at scripts/peerbit_curated_edges.json (may be mirrored into benchmarks/ts/ later).
Pinned to the latest stable tag as of 2026-02-09 (v16.1.6).
This corpus should get its own curated edge set (benchmarks/ts/nextjs_curated_edges.json) for repeatable quality scoring.
